items.Justification: While this paper discusses guide stars for Thirty Meter Telescope operations, it does not directly relate to Free Space Optical Communication (FSOC), adaptive optics, or atmospheric turbulence monitoring.
This paper is about citizen science data release for variable star classification and does not relate to FSOC, adaptive optics, or optical communication technologies.
This paper focuses on cryogenic performance of superconducting detectors and is not directly relevant to FSOC, adaptive optics, or wavefront sensing.
This paper presents the conceptual design of a large submillimeter telescope but does not discuss FSOC, adaptive optics, or atmospheric turbulence monitoring.
This paper focuses on identifying black holes using space telescopes and deep learning, which is not directly relevant to FSOC, adaptive optics, or phase control in laser communication.
